analysis.key_quote: Schedule F is totally outside federal civil service rules of. Protection for employees. It is a way to revive the old “SPOILS SYSTEM” that allows so much corruption and incompetence.
analysis.rationale: The comment explicitly opposes the proposed rule by highlighting its deviation from civil service protections and likening it to the corrupt 'spoils system,' which indicates concerns about politicization and the erosion of merit-based standards.
